outputs.output_descr: The project will facilitate the elaboration of the national concept of regional economies' competitiveness, perform a comparative analysis of the socio-economic context in the regions, identify the regional economic and social "growth points", and develop recommendations for enhancing the regional economies' effectiveness and reducing the disparities in the quality of life in the regions of Belarus.

project_descr: National Human Development Report (NHDR): Sources of regional competitiveness in Belarus
